name: tudo passa
description: Tudo passa   This video is the initial fragment of a painting that didn't work out very well, but the process was very nice. It has changed and is still changing, I would like to bring a little of this leisurely walk. "Everything passes". The technique used was fluidpainting, where large amounts of water are added to the paints to generate a fluid blending effect. Before starting a fluidart, I like to prepare the canvas with a mixture of very liquid paint so that the colors slide over the canva
